xwikidoc.name: EmailSent
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Email Sent

use.name: use
use.values: currentPage=Always on this page|onDemand=On demand|always=Always on this wiki

xwikidoc.content:
#set($from = $xwiki.getXWikiPreference("admin_email")) The first step in becoming a Planète Sankoré member is now complete.
To complete your registration, check your email inbox for message from ${from}.
If you do not see the email, it may be because of a SPAM filter. Check your SPAM folder and be sure to add Planète Sankoré $from to your "safe senders" list or address book.
*If you have not received an email within 10 minutes, please contact Planète Sankoré by using the content form at the lower right of this page.
